title: Would tank Gangplank with no crit be viable?
body:
I play mostly tanks, and find gp too squishy when build Ad Crit

Would a full tank/hp type build be viable?

Build along the lines of:
{{item:3748}} Titanic Hydra for the on hit damage from Q and auto attacks
{{item:3742}}  Movement speed buff and hp, (Also not sure if the _Momentum stacks_ discharge from his Q)
{{item:3025}} Armour, sheen and slow
{{item:3143}}  or {{item:3065}} Depending on resistance needed
{{item:3053}} Hp, bonus ad and useful passive.

replies.body:
You can build him however you like.

Crit-Plank
Tank-Plank
AP GP

Each requires a different way to play him, but you can do it

Tank-Plank used to be the "real" build before his changes
If you decide to build him tanky, regardless of enemy comp, I think the spirit visage is a must since it increases your orange heal.
full tank is op think about the heal on his orange sea balls
Seen it do decently with an IE after 2 or 3 tank items, think he had a cleaver tho 2.
